Pogodi.InitialForm.wait: Wait for the game to start
Categorias.Categorias.Rules: A category is chosen randomly. Before your turn ends you have to think a word that is part of the category and write it. Then, the other players will vote if the word is valid or not. You will loose if more than 50% of players votes no or if you run out of time.
Vikingos.Vikingos.NotLeader: You cant begin the game because you are not the leader
Vikingos.Vikingos.Rules: As a Viking you have an assigned color, you must look which viking begins and be aware of your turn. The current viking must choose the viking he wants to call by pressing its image, when this happens the surrounding players of the one who has been called must click the contrary side of the viking that was called. The one that fails loose!
